entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.0°C

Humidity: 81 %

Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h gust 60 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
